SEARCH
Package entity

Class Staff

Object
User
Staff
public class Staff extends User
This class represents a staff member in the system, inheriting basic user attributes
Since:
25/11/23
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Camp>
    campsCreatedList
    The list of camps created by the staff member

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Staff(String userID, String name, String faculty, String password)
    Constructs a new Staff object with the specified user ID, name, faculty, and password

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCampToList(Camp camp)
    Adds a camp to the list of camps created by the staff member
    void
    createNewCamp()
    Creates a new camp by prompting the staff member for various details The new camp is added to the list of camps created by the staff member
    void
    deleteCamp()
    Deletes a camp from the list of camps created by the staff member If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed The staff member is prompted to choose a camp to delete, and the camp is removed from the list and the repository if there are no registered participants
    void
    generateEnquiryReport()
    Generates an enquiry report for the staff member's chosen camp If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed
    void
    generatePerformanceReport()
    Generates a performance report for the staff member's chosen camp If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed
    ArrayList<Camp>
    getListOfCampsCreated()
    Retrieves the list of camps created by the staff member

    Methods inherited from class User

    getFaculty, getName, getPassword, getUserID, setPassword

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • campsCreatedList

      private ArrayList<Camp> campsCreatedList
      The list of camps created by the staff member

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String userID, String name, String faculty, String password)
      Constructs a new Staff object with the specified user ID, name, faculty, and password
      Parameters:
      userID - - the user ID of the staff member
      name - - the name of the staff member
      faculty - - the faculty of the staff member
      password - - the password of the staff member

  • Method Details

    • getListOfCampsCreated

      public ArrayList<Camp> getListOfCampsCreated()
      Retrieves the list of camps created by the staff member
      Returns:
      the list of camps created

    • addCampToList

      public void addCampToList(Camp camp)
      Adds a camp to the list of camps created by the staff member
      Parameters:
      camp - - the camp to add to the list

    • createNewCamp

      public void createNewCamp()
      Creates a new camp by prompting the staff member for various details The new camp is added to the list of camps created by the staff member

    • generateEnquiryReport

      public void generateEnquiryReport()
      Generates an enquiry report for the staff member's chosen camp If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed

    • generatePerformanceReport

      public void generatePerformanceReport()
      Generates a performance report for the staff member's chosen camp If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed

    • deleteCamp

      public void deleteCamp()
      Deletes a camp from the list of camps created by the staff member If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed The staff member is prompted to choose a camp to delete, and the camp is removed from the list and the repository if there are no registered participants
